# center

**Type Property**

A guide that marks the center of the view.

## Declaration

```swift
static let center: Alignment
```

## Discussion

This alignment combines the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/HorizontalAlignment/center] horizontal guide and the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/VerticalAlignment/center] vertical guide:



## Getting middle guides

- **leading**: A guide that marks the leading edge of the view.
- **trailing**: A guide that marks the trailing edge of the view.

items.description: A guide that marks the leading edge of the view.
